name: ServerCentral
tag_list: colocation, collocation, cloud-services, managed-services, network-services, iaas, infrastructure
overview:
Headquartered in Chicago since 2000, ServerCentral is an industry leading data center solutions provider specializing in infrastructure colocation, IP networking, cloud computing, and managed services. Their strategically-located facilities allow them to serve a diverse roster of clients, from Fortune 500 companies, to online retailers, small businesses, and more.

With personalized services, 24/7 on-site technical support, and secure data centers, ServerCentral knows how to keep critical IT infrastructure running smoothly.

ServerCentral provides unwavering commitment to ensure that their customers receive the strongest infrastructure services available anywhere.
